B

Bishop - Class in com.chess.piece
Bishop class is a child class of the Piece class It deals with the construction and movement of the Bishop piece on the board and other specific methods needed for the bishop piece The methods found here are: calculateLegalMove(), movePiece(), isColA(), isColH(), isCastled(), and toString()
Bishop(int, Color) - Constructor for class com.chess.piece.Bishop
 
Bishop(int, Color, boolean) - Constructor for class com.chess.piece.Bishop
 
BISHOP - com.chess.piece.Piece.PieceType
 
BLACK - com.chess.Color
 
blackPlayer() - Method in class com.chess.board.Board
blackPlayer() method does not take any parameter and it is basically a getter method for other parts of the program to get the blackPlayer initialized in the board.
BlackPlayer - Class in com.chess.player
BlackPlayer is a child class of the Player Class This class contains methods that can only be done specifically by the black player
BlackPlayer(Board, Collection<Move>, Collection<Move>) - Constructor for class com.chess.player.BlackPlayer
 
board - Variable in class com.chess.board.Move
 
board - Variable in class com.chess.player.Player
 
Board - Class in com.chess.board
Board Class is the class where the board is created It has the following methods: whitePlayer(), blackPlayer(), currentPlayer(), getAllLegalMoves(), calculateActivePieces(), calculateLegalMoves(), getWhitePieces(), getBlackPieces(), getEnPassantPawn(), getTile(), createGameBoard(), and createStandardBoard() The static class Builder can also be found within this file
Board.Builder - Class in com.chess.board
Builder class uses the Builder Design Pattern to create a complex object using simple object basically creating a board for a chess game in our case the methods found here are setPiece(), setMoveMaker(), build() and, setEnPassantPawn
BoardEvaluator - Interface in com.chess.player.chessEngine
an interface class to evaluate the board
BoardUtils - Class in com.chess.board
BoardUtils is a class for miscellaneous things needed for the logic of the game to work properly\ The methods that can be found here are the following: isValidTile(), initColumn(), initRow(), getPositionAtTile(), getTileAtPosition()
build() - Method in class com.chess.board.Board.Builder
build() is a method that creates the board with the specific boardConfig
Builder() - Constructor for class com.chess.board.Board.Builder
Builder() is a constructor and sets the boardConfig as a HashMap which lets us have a less expensive program since we can just map each piece to a certain tile coordinate
